sentences: Born at Innsbruck, she was trained  by her mother, a piano teacher, and made her first public appearance as soloist at the age of nine in Joseph Haydn's Piano Concerto Hob.
Starting from 1944 she studied with Winfried Wolf in Kitzb√ºhel and, from 1946 to 1949, with Franz Ledwinka at the Mozarteum at Salzburg.
